alert.note: Alert for Butte; Lawrence (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 23 at 7:13PM MDT until June 23 at 7:45PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 745 PM MDT FOR WESTERN BUTTE...NORTHERN LAWRENCE AND NORTHEASTERN CROOK COUNTIES... At 712 PM MDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 11 miles northeast of Colony to 6 miles west of Belle Fourche to 4 miles northwest of Cement Ridge Lookout, moving east at 40 mph. 60 mph wind gusts were recently observed 7 miles southwest of Aladdin. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Public. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Belle Fourche, Antelope Butte, Belle Fourche Reservoir, Fruitdale, northern Spearfish Canyon, Bridal Veil Falls, Spearfish, Arpan, Two Top Butte, Saint Onge, Whitewood and Apple Springs. This includes... Interstate 90 in South Dakota between Mile Markers 1 and 28. Interstate 90 in Wyoming between Mile Markers 200 and 207. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM MDT for northeastern Wyoming. A Tornado Watch also remains in effect until midnight MDT for northwestern and west central South Dakota. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
